attributes.action: Allow us to smoke in our own vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I've never heard anything so ridiculous that we will no longer be able to smoke in our own vehicles.  If it believed that we would not be in control of our own vehicle whilst smoking, then maybe children should be banned from travelling in our cars, as I can honestly say that I have been more distracted whilst driving since having a baby, than I ever have been smoking in my own car!  This is totally against our human rights.  I'm furious.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
